name: IOUserAudioLevelControl
desc: A control object that supports setting an audio level, with either scalar or decibel values.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the level control class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of a level control.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - HandleChangeScalarValue
items.desc: Tells the slider control the scalar value is changing.

items.name: - HandleChangeDecibelValue
items.desc: Tells the slider control the decibel value is changing.

items.name: - SetScalarValue
items.desc: Sets the scalar value of the level control.

items.name: - GetScalarValue
items.desc: Gets the scalar value of the level control.

items.name: - SetDecibelValue
items.desc: Sets the decibel value of the level control.

items.name: - GetDecibelValue
items.desc: Gets the decibel value of the level control.
